document_data.caption: A map showing Crypt Street in southwest Zhentil Keep.
document_data.name: Crypt Street
document_data.ends: Wall of the [[Zhentil Keep/Harbor District|Harbor District]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Crypt Street''' was a road located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Crypt Street was located in the southwest corner of Zhentil Keep within the [[Zhentil Keep/Common Quarter|Common Quarter]]. The road ran west to east roughly parallel to the outer southern wall of the city, originating on [[Beggars' Way]] and ending at the wall of the [[Zhentil Keep/Harbor District|Harbor District]]. Crypt Street was intersected by [[Dixon Street]] and [[Brigand Way]].
